metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21842 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An exploitable integer overflow vulnerability exists within the MPEG-4decoding functionality of the GPAC Project on Advanced Content libraryv1.0.1. A specially crafted MPEG-4 input can cause an integer overflow whenprocessing an atom using the 'ssix' FOURCC code, due to uncheckedarithmetic resulting in a heap-based buffer overflow that causes memorycorruption. An attacker can convince a user to open a video to trigger thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: gpac package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
